episodes.title: (Full Podcast) The Vampire Cult Murders of Rod Ferrell | The True Crime Story That Shook the 90s
episodes.description:
In 1996, Rod Ferrell led the self-proclaimed “Vampire Clan” into a spiral of rituals, obsession, and murder. This is the documented, step-by-step account of how fantasy and manipulation ended in tragedy, shocking America and sparking debates on youth culture, cults, and the dark side of human influence.

00:00:00 The Emergence of the Vampire Clan
00:04:11 The Journey to Eustis: A Plan to Rescue
00:07:22 Rituals and Initiation in the Graveyard
00:10:20 The Murders in the Wendorf Home
00:13:20 The Manhunt and Capture in Baton Rouge
00:16:17 Confessions, Trials, and Sentencing
00:19:20 The Legacy: Media, Public Fear, and Lasting Uncertainty
